name: fortinet-web-filter-lookup
label: Fortinet Web Filter Lookup
description: Fortinet Web Filter Lookup allows users to check category and classification for any Domain

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: base_url
fields.description: URL of the Fortinet Web Filter Lookup to which you will connect and check categorization for domain.

fields.title: Token
fields.name: token
fields.description: Token to access the Fortinet Web Filter Lookup. To be requested in FNDN website: https://fndn.fortinet.net/index.php?app=fortiguard&module=apitokens&controller=tokenrequest&do=requestToken

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: It is Selected then it verifies SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether SSL verification required to establish the connection between the connector and server. By default, this option is set as false.

operations.description: Get Domain reviewed by Fortinet Web Filter Lookup
operations.title: Check Category of Domain or URL

parameters.name: sample_url
parameters.title: Submit Domain/URL
parameters.description: Please enter a valid Domain for the review process
parameters.tooltip: Please enter a valid Domain or URL for the review process
